mapper.sql: SELECT MAX(DECODE(MAC_ANICODE1, 'I', MAC_ANICODE1)) MAC_1 , MAX(DECODE(MAC_ANICODE1, 'A', MAC_ANICODE1)) MAC_2 , MAX(DECODE(MAC_ANICODE1, 'B', MAC_ANICODE1)) MAC_3 , MAX(DECODE(MAC_ANICODE1, 'R', MAC_ANICODE1)) MAC_4 , MAX(DECODE(MAC_ANICODE1, 'M', MAC_ANICODE1)) MAC_5 FROM ( SELECT MAC_ANICODE1, MAC_NAME, MAC_ANICLSCODE FROM MF_ANI_CLS WHERE MAC_ANICLSCODE = CONCAT (MAC_ANICODE1, '0-0-0') AND MAC_ANICODE1 IN ('I','A','B','R','M') )
